snippet: The G.O.P. is seeking to make Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez’s sexual harassment scandal a campaign issue against Democrats.
abstract: New York Republicans are turning sexual harassment allegations against Assemblyman Vito J Lopez into a campaign issue against Democrats; Republican candidates are calling on their opponents to denounce Lopez, a powerful Brooklyn Democrat, and are increasing calls for Democrats to demand that Assembly Speaker Sheldon Silver relinquish his leadership post after revelations that he authorized a secret settlement of some of the allegations against Lopez.

byline.contributor: David W. Chen contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The G.O.P. is seeking to make Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez’s sexual harassment scandal a campaign issue against Democrats.

headline.seo: Sexual Harassment Scandal in Albany Becomes Political Fodder
headline.main: Republicans Use Lopez Case as a Weapon
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Using Lopez’s Case As a Weapon
